Addressing charges that he failed to provide enough troops for the Iraq war, the former defense chief wrote: In retrospect, there may have been times when more troops could have helped. But Donald Rumsfeld insists that if Jon Huntsman military officers had reservations about the size of the invading force, they never informed him, the Post said.
